entry.title: Django 배포
entry.content:
Django는 웹 서버와 직접 통신할 수 없어서 둘 사이에 WSGI를 두어야 한다.

uWSGI 설치

link

uWSGI
entry.summary: Django는 웹 서버와 직접 통신할 수 없어서 둘 사이에 WSGI를 두어야 한다.

entry.title: Ubuntu에 uwsgi 설치
entry.content:
가상환경 활성화

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ source my-pj-venv/bin/activate
(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$

uwsgi가 install되어있는지 확인

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ uwsgi --version
-bash: uwsgi: command not found

pip를 이용해 uwsgi 설치

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo pip install uwsgi
[sudo] password for ubuntu: 
Collecting uwsgi
  Downloading uwsgi-2.0.20.tar.gz (804 kB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 804 kB 2.5 MB/s 
Building wheels for collected packages: uwsgi
  Building wheel for uwsgi (setup.py) ... done
  Created wheel for uwsgi: filename=uWSGI-2.0.20-cp38-cp38-linux_x86_64.whl size=553634 sha256=88f71534495e9368737a4f1532555f39cbcac9c737d6f096f47e5ff6db6a1853
  Stored in directory: /root/.cache/pip/wheels/cb/4d/54/002a215100a8c4e125654600f0a4304dae742442ddc4ba6ea1
Successfully built uwsgi
Installing collected packages: uwsgi
Successfully installed uwsgi-2.0.20

entry.title: Ubuntu에 Postgresql 설치
entry.content:
postgresql과 postgresql-contrib패키지 설치

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get install postgresql postgresql-contrib
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
The following additional packages will be installed:

...

postgresql을 실행시켜 동작 확인

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo service postgresql start
 * Starting PostgreSQL 12 database server                                [ OK ] 

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ service postgresql status
12/main (port 5432): online

entry.title: Ubuntu에 python 가상환경 설치
entry.content:
python이 install되어있는지 확인

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version
Python 3.8.10

venv 모듈 설치

python3.6 이상 버전 부터는 python-venv 패키지를 설치하여 venv 모듈을 사용

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ pip --version
pip 20.0.2 from /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/pip (python 3.8)
ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt install python3-venv
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
The following additional packages will be installed:
  python3.8-venv
The following NEW packages will be installed:
  python3-venv python3.8-venv
0 upgraded, 2 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
Need to get 6680 B of archives.
After this operation, 38.9 kB of additional disk space will be used.
Do you want to continue? [Y/n] Y

...

가상환경을 저장할 디렉토리로 이동

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ cd [dir_path]

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 -m venv my-pj-venv     
ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ ls
my-pj-venv

가상환경 활성화

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ source my-pj-venv/bin/activate
(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$

이제 가상 환경이 활성화되었으므로 pip을 사용하여 패키지를 설치, 업그레이드 및 제거할 수 있습니다. 가상 환경에서 pip3 대신 명령 pip을 사용하고 python3 대신 python을 사용할 수 있습니다.

가상환경 비활성화

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ deactivate
entry.summary: python이 install되어있는지 확인 ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version Python 3.8.10

entry.title: Ubuntu에 python 설치
entry.content:
apt-get으로 설치

python이 install되어있는지 확인

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version
-bash: python3: command not found

우분투 설치 관리자 apt 업데이트

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get update

python 설치

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get install python3
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
The following additional packages will be installed:
  libpython3-stdlib python3-minimal python3.8 python3.8-minimal

...

0 upgraded, 5 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
Need to get 2365 kB of archives.
After this operation, 6494 kB of additional disk space will be used.
Do you want to continue? [Y/n] Y

...


ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version
Python 3.8.10

pip 설치

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get install pip
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
Note, selecting 'python3-pip' instead of 'pip'

...

0 upgraded, 94 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
Need to get 63.5 MB of archives.
After this operation, 281 MB of additional disk space will be used.
Do you want to continue? [Y/n] Y

...


ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ pip --version
pip 20.0.2 from /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/pip (python 3.8)

pvenv로 설치

pvenv 설치

(my-pj-venv) $ curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yyuu/pyenv-installer/master/bin/pyenv-installer | bash
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
100  1687  100  1687    0     0   5604      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--  5604
Cloning into '/home/ubuntu/.pyenv'...

pyenv 환경변수 설정

shell에서 pyenv를 사용할 수 있도록 환경변수에 추가

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$  vi ~/.bashrc

맨 아래에 다음과 같이 추가 후 저장

...
export PATH="~/.pyenv/bin:$PATH"
eval "$(pyenv init -)"
eval "$(pyenv virtualenv-init -)"

pyenv 필수 패키지 설치

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~/my-pj-venv$ sudo apt-get install -y make build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev \
libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev wget curl llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev \
xz-utils tk-dev

entry.title: Ubuntu에 유저 추가하기
entry.content:
adduser [username]

root@2cffa83792ef:/# adduser ubuntu
Adding user `ubuntu' ...
Adding new group `ubuntu' (1000) ...
Adding new user `ubuntu' (1000) with group `ubuntu' ...
Creating home directory `/home/ubuntu' ...
Copying files from `/etc/skel' ...

패스워드 입력

New password: 
Retype new password: 
passwd: password updated successfully
Changing the user information for ubuntu

추가 정보 입력

Enter the new value, or press ENTER for the default
	Full Name []: 
	Room Number []: 
	Work Phone []: 
	Home Phone []: 
	Other []:

입력 정보 확인

Is the information correct? [Y/n] Y

change user

root@2cffa83792ef:/# su - ubuntu
ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$

생성한 user를 sudoer 파일에 추가 (관리자 권한)

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ exit
root@2cffa83792ef:/# vi /etc/sudoers

#
# This file MUST be edited with the 'visudo' command as root.
#
# Please consider adding local content in /etc/sudoers.d/ instead of
# directly modifying this file.
#
# See the man page for details on how to write a sudoers file.
#
Defaults        env_reset
Defaults        mail_badpass
Defaults        secure_path="/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/snap/bin"

# Host alias specification

# User alias specification

# Cmnd alias specification

# User privilege specification
root    ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL

# Members of the admin group may gain root privileges
%admin ALL=(ALL) ALL

# Allow members of group sudo to execute any command
%sudo   ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL

# See sudoers(5) for more information on "#include" directives:

#includedir /etc/sudoers.d
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
~                                                                                                                            
"/etc/sudoers" [readonly] 30L, 755C                                                                        6,1           All

20번째 줄에 있는 root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL아래에 다음을 추가

ubuntu ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL

entry.title: Ubuntu에 django 설치
entry.content:
python이 install되어있는지 확인

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version
Python 3.8.10

python 가상환경 설치

python 가상환경 활성화

django 설치

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ pip install django
Collecting django
  Downloading Django-3.2.9-py3-none-any.whl (7.9 MB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 7.9 MB 2.3 MB/s 
Collecting sqlparse>=0.2.2
  Downloading sqlparse-0.4.2-py3-none-any.whl (42 kB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 42 kB 2.1 MB/s 
Collecting asgiref<4,>=3.3.2
  Downloading asgiref-3.4.1-py3-none-any.whl (25 kB)
Collecting pytz
  Downloading pytz-2021.3-py2.py3-none-any.whl (503 kB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 503 kB 59.0 MB/s 
Installing collected packages: sqlparse, asgiref, pytz, django
Successfully installed asgiref-3.4.1 django-3.2.9 pytz-2021.3 sqlparse-0.4.2

django 버전 확인

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python -m django --version
3.2.9
entry.summary: python이 install되어있는지 확인 ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ python3 --version Python 3.8.10

entry.title: Ubuntu에 nginx 설치
entry.content:

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ nginx --version

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get install nginx
Reading package lists... Done

entry.title: Ubuntu에 git 설치
entry.content:
git install되어있는지 확인

ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ git --version
-bash: git: command not found

git 설치

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ sudo apt-get install git
[sudo] password for ubuntu: 
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done

...

After this operation, 52.1 MB of additional disk space will be used.
Do you want to continue? [Y/n] Y

...

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ git --version
git version 2.25.1

git 설정

깃에 push했을때 올라갈 내 정보를 입력

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ git config --global user.name [git_username]
(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ git config --global user.mail [git_email]

git repository 가져오기

(my-pj-venv) ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~/my-pj-venv$ git clone [pj_url.git]
entry.summary: git install되어있는지 확인 ubuntu@2cffa83792ef:~$ git --version -bash: git: command not found

entry.title: CentOS의 Jupyter Notebook 외부에서 접속하기
entry.content:
선행: CentOS에 Jupyter Notebook 설치

프로파일 생성

$ jupyter notebook --generate-config

위의 명령어를 통해 ‘/home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py’파일이 생성된다

내부ip 확인

$ ifconfig
ens3: flags=4163<UP,BROADCAST,RUNNING,MULTICAST>  mtu 9001
        inet [확인해야 할 ip주소]  netmask 255.255.240.0  broadcast 172.31.47.255
        inet6 fe80::85e:e5ff:fe32:421a  prefixlen 64  scopeid 0x20<link>
        ether 0a:5e:e5:32:42:1a  txqueuelen 1000  (Ethernet)
        RX packets 38282  bytes 19365933 (18.4 MiB)
        RX errors 0  dropped 0  overruns 0  frame 0
        TX packets 25593  bytes 11975222 (11.4 MiB)
        TX errors 0  dropped 0 overruns 0  carrier 0  collisions 0

lo: flags=73<UP,LOOPBACK,RUNNING>  mtu 65536
        inet 127.0.0.1  netmask 255.0.0.0
        inet6 ::1  prefixlen 128  scopeid 0x10<host>
        loop  txqueuelen 1000  (Local Loopback)
        RX packets 23438  bytes 7890927 (7.5 MiB)
        RX errors 0  dropped 0  overruns 0  frame 0
        TX packets 23438  bytes 7890927 (7.5 MiB)
        TX errors 0  dropped 0 overruns 0  carrier 0  collisions 0

[확인해야 할 ip주소] 를 기록해둔다

프로파일 수정

$ vi /home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

ip address 수정 후 주석 제거

# /home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

(중략)

c.NotebookApp.ip = '[위에서 기록해놓은 ip주소 입력]'

jupyter notebook 실행 후 web-browser 실행 안되게 변경 후 주석 제거

# /home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

(중략)

c.NotebokkApp.open_browser = False

(후략)

포트번호 설정 후 주석 제거

# /home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

(중략)

c.NotebookApp.port = XXXX

(후략)

비밀번호 설정

$ ipython

from IPython.lib import passwd
passwd()

비밀번호를 2회 입력 후 출력된 해시(‘sha1:…’) 복사

# /home/(username)/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

(중략)

# c.NotebookApp.password = '위에서 복사한 hash 입력'

(후략)

서버에서 jupyter notebook 실행

$ jupyter notebook

이후 클라이언트에서 http://서버ip주소:8000 로 접속
